channel.title: Need excel pro
channel.description: I want a formula that would check if the cell if it is a 1 or a 0 and then add the number above it. (turning binary to ip address) Example: 128 64 32 16 8 4 2 1 1 0 0 0 1 1 1 1 if its a 1 add the number above it, so 128+8+4+2+1 What would be the forumula to check and if so, add?

item.title: Need excel pro
item.dc:creator: @nickog15 nickog15
item.description:
@nickog15 wrote:

Thanks! I forgot 0x0=0

Read full topic

item.title: Need excel pro
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

I assume that the first line is A1, A2… and second line is B1, B2…

Then the formula should be:
= A1 * B1 + A2 * B2 + A3 * B3 + A4 * B4 + A5 * B5 + A6 * B6 + A7 * B7 + A8 * B8
I don’t have Excel, so you would have to test it yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Need excel pro
item.dc:creator: @nickog15 nickog15
item.description:
@nickog15 wrote:

I want a formula that would check if the cell if it is a 1 or a 0 and then add the number above it. (turning binary to ip address)
Example:
128 64 32 16 8 4 2 1
1 0 0 0 1 1 1 1
if its a 1 add the number above it, so 128+8+4+2+1
What would be the forumula to check and if so, add?

Read full topic
